sentences.english: The peasants here were of a much poorer class than those in Kousminski.
sentences.chinese: 这里的农民比库兹明斯科耶的农民要穷得多。

sentences.english: It is quite a waste for a poor commune like Dong Xuan.
sentences.chinese: 这对像东川这样的穷公社来说，是种浪费。

sentences.english: What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight .
sentences.chinese: 你穷数年之功建设起来的东西可能毁于一旦。

sentences.english: He’d also become Naomi’s slave and part-time beggarly brother.
sentences.chinese: 他也变成了内奥米的小奴隶，有时候则是她的穷兄弟。

sentences.english: Have not heard a word " fortune-telling rich burn incense and poor, " saying it?
sentences.chinese: 有没有听过一句话“穷算命富烧香”这句话呀？

sentences.english: I'm poor but I always enjoy myself.
sentences.chinese: 我虽然穷，可总是很开心。

sentences.chinese: 石渠之事既穷，上由桥西北下土山之阴，民又桥焉。

sentences.english: Even the emperor has straw-sandaled relatives.
It has great significance of edification for the development and construction of boundary and drop-behind districts.

sentences.english: He was looked down upon because of his poor family.
sentences.chinese: 他因家穷而被人看不起。

sentences.english: Do not start economizing when you are down to your last dollar.
sentences.chinese: 不要在穷得只剩最后一块钱时才开始节约。

sentences.english: Schultz has been both poor and good leader at Starbucks.

sentences.english: Nor does long our small Durance deal with that steep or deep.
sentences.chinese: 而我们耐力也有穷难以长应付这高这深。

sentences.english: Although poor, but as long as enough to eat, dress warm, sleep Haojiu Hang.
sentences.chinese: 虽然穷，但只要吃得饱，穿得暖，睡得好就行。

sentences.english: Having no money to see a doctor because my family was poor, I had to bear the pain myself.
sentences.chinese: 家里穷，也没钱看伤，疼痛只有自己忍着了。

sentences.english: Those children of mine have an appetite; they will eat me out of house and home.
sentences.chinese: 我的那些孩子可真能吃，他们会把我吃穷的。
